Headline: Temporary Northbound #94 California Reroute near California/35th Street
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted near California/35th Street.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 35th, Western, 31st, California, and resume normal route, due to, street blockage near California/35th Street.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
